enable_ads.description: Enable or disable ads in the app

ad_unit_id.description: AdMob ad unit ID for interstitial ads

revenue_cat_api_key.description: RevenueCat API key for in-app purchases

remove_ads_product_id.description: Product ID for remove ads in-app purchase

maintenance_mode.description: Enable maintenance mode to temporarily disable app features

puzzle_data_url.description: URL to hosted puzzle JSON file (Firebase Storage or Hosting)

puzzle_data_version.description: Expected SHA-256 hash of puzzle data for validation

min_app_version.description: Minimum app version required for puzzle data

version.description: Added puzzle data remote config parameters
